Title: An Act Naming the National Road Starting from the Boundary of Arayat, Pampanga and Ending at the Boundary of San Isidro, Nueva Ecija, the General Ismael D. Lapus National Highway
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 851
An Act Naming the National Road Starting from the Boundary of Arayat, Pampanga and Ending at the Boundary of San Isidro, Nueva Ecija, the General Ismael D. Lapus National Highway
Section 1. The national road from Barangay San Vicente, Municipality of Cabiao up to the boundary of San Isidro, Nueva Ecija, traversing the jurisdiction of the Municipality of Cabiao in the same province, is hereby named the General Ismael D. Lapus National Highway.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 27, 1984
